user.title: Add a pet
user.description: Select the type of pet you want to add.

name.title: Name your pet
name.description: Enter a name for your pet.

abort.already_configured: A pet with this name already exists.

log_bathroom_visit.name: Log bathroom visit
log_bathroom_visit.description: Record a bathroom visit for a pet

config_entry_id.name: Pet
config_entry_id.description: The pet that had a bathroom visit

poop_consistencies.name: Poop consistencies
poop_consistencies.description: The consistency of the poop - enter them in chronological order (e.g., normal, then diarrhea)

confirmed.name: Confirmed
confirmed.description: Whether this visit is confirmed. Set to false for AI/automated logs that need manual confirmation.

log_medication.name: Log medication
log_medication.description: Record a medication dose. Find medication ID in sensor entity names.

config_entry_id.name: Pet
config_entry_id.description: The pet that received the medication

medication_id.name: Medication ID
medication_id.description: The full UUID from sensor attributes. Find it in Developer Tools > States > Your medication sensor > medication_id attribute (e.g., 3abbc4af93ce468a90348f82f2c0ee80)

given_at.name: Given at
given_at.description: When the medication was given. Leave empty for current time, or click to select a past date/time

confirm_visit.name: Confirm visit
confirm_visit.description: Mark a bathroom visit as confirmed (typically used after AI/automated logging)

visit_id.name: Visit ID
visit_id.description: The ID of the visit to confirm (found in sensor attributes or logs)

reassign_visit.name: Reassign visit
reassign_visit.description: Change which pet a visit belongs to (automatically marks as confirmed)

visit_id.name: Visit ID
visit_id.description: The ID of the visit to reassign

config_entry_id.name: New pet
config_entry_id.description: The pet to reassign this visit to
